text: still struggling with this deduplication code... any ideas?

The contacts are running synchronously with the workflow but each enrollment is running asynchronously. The maximum number of executions for a CCA is 300/second though. <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1677704294879289?thread_ts=1677592376.689449&cid=C019VT42R8X>

Thank you <@U01QVR44MEY>, just to confirm, this means that possibly up to 300 contacts could execute in a CCA asynchronously at a given time. It is not waiting for 1 record to complete the CCA and move to the next Contact record.
that is correct although using the term async is a little off, they all run separately from each other but synchronously with the rest of the workflow.
